name: Snake (itch) (ezez33)
description:
--- SNAKE ---

Eat food to grow and avoid eating yourself - how long can you survive and how many apples can you eat? A variation of classic snake game.

=== GAMEPLAY ===

Only turning is allowed, so you can't eat yourself in this manner.

A new apple is spawned after one is eaten, and up to three apples will spawn to the playfield as time passes if no apple is eaten.

=== CONTROLS ===

Start - any key
Movement - arrow keys
Quick restart game - arrow keys / restart button
Back to main menu - space / back button
Reset high score - R (in start screen)

=== INFO ==== 

Programming, design and graphics by Sami S.

I created this as a learning experience.
